examples: After that, things moved forward at lightning speed.
We'll take the matter forward at our next meeting.
My children look forward to receiving gifts during the winter holidays.
He took a big step forward to start his new adventure.
He leaned forward to take her hand.
words.defineEn: facing or directed toward the front
words.defineVi: đối mặt hoặc hướng về phía trước

examples: Biology and computing are disciplines which seem like chalk and cheese but which have very deep connections on the most fundamental level.

The society believed that education was a fundamental human right, knowing that better unborn than untaught - it was essential to ensure that everyone had the opportunity to reach their full potential.
First off is the fundamentals.
So your fundamental frequency stays, well, fundamental.
So people no longer care about fundamentals.
words.defineEn: impacting the core and most important parts of something; the most basic or important
words.defineVi: tác động đến phần cốt lõi và quan trọng nhất của một cái gì đó; cơ bản nhất hoặc quan trọng nhất

examples: The grand unified theory is compact and elegant in mathematical terms.
The country celebrated its independence with a grand parade and fireworks.
In politics, people often make grand speeches but fail to take action.
The wise owls went to visit their grand kids in their scooters.
The grand finale of the performance is the crowning glory of the entire show, leaving the audience in awe.
words.defineEn: very impressive and large
words.defineVi: rất ấn tượng và lớn

examples: The movie was hilarious.
A clumsy chef accidentally spills ingredients, knocks over pots, and slips on the floor, creating a hilarious comedy of errors in the kitchen.
These kids are hilarious.
My mom is hilarious.
This thing is hilarious.
words.defineEn: causing great amusement and laughter
words.defineVi: gây ra niềm vui lớn và tiếng cười

examples: Not all men are as honorable or hold to the same standards as Sam.
Not all men are as honorable or hold to the same standards as Sam.
He’s an honorable man.
And even though they failed, these are honorable efforts.
The first words out of his mouth was, Mr. Kim, are you an honorable man?
words.defineEn: morally good and deserving respect
words.defineVi: đạo đức tốt và đáng được tôn trọng

examples: It would be humorous if it weren't so sad the way Sarah tiptoes around her wife.
Whenever I'm feeling down, I try to watch a funny movie or read a humorous book.
I fear pranks, people think of me as a humorous fellow, some of you, some people do, and they always think, oh, you must love pranks.
He creates digital images and videos, humorous, grotesque, social commentary.
There were humorous TV ads where people with mouths full of chocolate chip cookies or peanut butter sandwiches found themselves grasping hopelessly for a glass of milk.
words.defineEn: making one laugh particularly by being enjoyable
words.defineVi: làm cho một người cười đặc biệt bằng cách thú vị

examples: When we presented our ideas to the boss, he was impressed that our solutions were so similar - I guess great minds think alike.
He was so impressed that he jumped up and down with excitement.
I was really impressed with how quickly Sarah turned that trick on the computer problem.
I'm impressed.
I was impressed.
words.defineEn: respecting or admiring a person or thing, particularly because of their excellent achievements or qualities
words.defineVi: tôn trọng hoặc ngưỡng mộ một người hoặc một vật, đặc biệt là vì những thành tích hoặc phẩm chất xuất sắc của họ

examples: For Walter, disaster followed hard on the heels of his initial success.

The real estate investment provided a high yield, exceeding the initial expectations of the investors.
She realized that her initial assumption was correct.
The successful entrepreneur knew that money makes money and used his initial profits to fund new business ventures that eventually made him a millionaire.
words.defineEn: related to or happening at the beginning
words.defineVi: liên quan đến hoặc xảy ra lúc đầu

examples: The inner box holds the cheese and has holes in it.
The inner box holds the cheese and has holes in it.
My father had a living in an inner suburb of Leeds which had been going down in the world for decades.
The film incorporated abstract imagery and surreal elements to convey the protagonist's inner emotional journey.
The talented artist painted a beautiful portrait of a woman, capturing her strength and inner beauty on the canvas.
words.defineEn: located inside; near the center
words.defineVi: nằm bên trong; gần trung tâm

examples: The intended experiment was a failure, and she had ruined some glassware.
You don't punish someone for crimes they neither INTENDED or COMMITTED.
words.defineEn: used to describe what one aims to reach or accomplish
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để mô tả những gì một người nhằm đạt được hoặc hoàn thành

examples: This class is intense!

The intense gaze from across the room, eyes on stalks, left no doubt about his attraction.

I love the intense flavor of black currants in my morning smoothie.
words.defineEn: very extreme or great
words.defineVi: rất cực đoan hoặc tuyệt vời

examples: But the lawyers also described internal politics that at times slowed down the department's work or drove a wedge among members of the team.
You have internal energy.
Internal energy is 0.
Monarch butterflies actually have two internal clocks.
Monarch butterflies actually have two internal clocks.
words.defineEn: located in or related to the inside of something
words.defineVi: nằm trong hoặc liên quan đến bên trong của một cái gì đó

examples: Throughout development, the most complex parts of our bodies get a literal headstart.

- They were literal quotes from you.
words.defineEn: (of a word or phrase) original or the most basic
words.defineVi: (của một từ hoặc cụm từ) nguyên bản hoặc cơ bản nhất

examples: Meat and mass never hindered man.

words.defineEn: involving or impacting a large number of things or people
words.defineVi: liên quan đến hoặc tác động đến một số lượng lớn những thứ hoặc con người

examples: An industrial machine like that can cut through any material like a knife through butter.

words.defineEn: related to money, living conditions, possessions, etc. instead of the things that the soul or mind needs
words.defineVi: liên quan đến tiền bạc, điều kiện sống, tài sản, v.v. thay vì những thứ mà linh hồn hoặc tâm trí cần

examples: Minor celebrity status did not become Potter.

words.defineEn: of little importance, effect, or seriousness, particularly when compared to other similar things
words.defineVi: ít quan trọng, ảnh hưởng hoặc mức độ nghiêm trọng, đặc biệt khi so sánh với những thứ tương tự khác

examples: He had mixed feelings about the whole project.
but I have mixed feelings about him

words.defineEn: made up of or consisting of different types of people or things
words.defineVi: được tạo thành từ hoặc bao gồm các loại người hoặc vật khác nhau

examples: Adding a pinch of dulse flakes to my stir-fry enhances the overall taste.

words.defineEn: including or considering everything or everyone in a certain situation or group
words.defineVi: bao gồm hoặc xem xét mọi thứ hoặc mọi người trong một tình huống hoặc nhóm nhất định

words.defineEn: having the possibility to develop or be developed into something particular in the future

examples: Thirteen is a prime number.

At the age of 75, the singer is not exactly in the prime of his life!
words.defineEn: first in importance or rank

words.defineEn: of the highest importance or influence
words.defineVi: có tầm quan trọng hoặc ảnh hưởng cao nhất

examples: He bought pure maple syrup from a local farm.

Sarah believes that people are inherently good, and that if you approach them with kindness and trust, they will reciprocate - she truly embodies the idea that to the pure all things are pure.
words.defineEn: not combined or mixed with anything else

examples: Dinoflagellates are capable of rapid movement due to their flagella.

words.defineVi: thực hiện hoặc xảy ra rất nhanh hoặc trong một thời gian ngắn

examples: In one way or another, the representatives will be compared with the total client system.

words.defineEn: typical of a specific group or thing; being a typical example of something or someone particular
words.defineVi: điển hình của một nhóm hoặc điều cụ thể; là một ví dụ điển hình của một cái gì đó hoặc một ai đó cụ thể

examples: Local residents have raised concerns about late-night noise.

words.defineEn: living somewhere particular
words.defineVi: sống ở một nơi cụ thể

words.defineEn: occurring as a usual part of a process or job
words.defineVi: xảy ra như một phần bình thường của một quá trình hoặc công việc

examples: He was shocked to realize that the finger of suspicion was now pointed at him.

dearly, was shocked.

words.defineVi: rất ngạc nhiên hoặc khó chịu vì điều gì đó bất ngờ hoặc khó chịu

examples: A slight question mark against her character remains.

words.defineEn: not a lot in amount, size, or extent
words.defineVi: không nhiều về số lượng, kích thước hoặc mức độ

examples: Coach's career is on a sticky wicket.

words.defineEn: coated with or made of a substance that sticks when touched
words.defineVi: phủ hoặc làm bằng chất dính khi chạm vào

examples: The cleaning product contains stiff chemicals that effectively remove tough stains.

words.defineEn: not flexible and therefore hard to bend or change shape
words.defineVi: không linh hoạt và do đó khó uốn cong hoặc thay đổi hình dạng

examples: Too many CEOs follow the ostrich plan, sticking their head in the sand in an unconscious effort to avoid bad news, and the responsibility that goes with it.

She was almost unconscious and did not recognize him at first.
That's the power of our adaptive unconscious.
words.defineEn: unaware of the surroundings and not awake, which is caused by either an illness or injury
words.defineVi: không nhận thức được xung quanh và không tỉnh táo, nguyên nhân là do bệnh tật hoặc chấn thương

examples: They are on their uppers but manage to hide the fact from their friends.

Despite all of the hardships he faced, John always kept a stiff upper lip and didn't let anything bother him.
words.defineEn: situated above something similar
words.defineVi: nằm trên một cái gì đó tương tự

examples: The cruise went very quickly.

words.defineEn: used to emphasize that one is talking about the exact same person or thing and not about anyone or anything else
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để nhấn mạnh rằng một người đang nói về cùng một người hoặc vật chứ không phải về bất kỳ ai hoặc bất cứ điều gì khác

examples: Lichen plays a vital role in soil formation and ecosystem development.

The president singled out education as a vital tool in bridging the gap between rich and poor.
Attachment is vital.
words.defineEn: absolutely necessary and of great importance
words.defineVi: hoàn toàn cần thiết và có tầm quan trọng lớn

examples: The two sides in the dispute are finally willing to talk.

I'm willing to accept some minor edits on my script, but I draw a line at any major rewrites.

words.defineEn: eager, interested, or ready to do something
words.defineVi: háo hức, quan tâm, hoặc sẵn sàng để làm một cái gì đó
